scripts.setup: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && cd strudel && git checkout main && git stash && git pull && cd .. && git commit -a -m 'Updated Strudel from origin.'
scripts.build-strudel: python3 patch-strudel.py && cd strudel && pnpm run setup && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run build-strudel && vite build && mkdir -p cloud-5 && cp -rf strudel/website/dist/* cloud-5/ && rm cloud-5/CNAME && pandoc -s cloud-5.css --ascii=true README.md -o cloud-5/index.html && python3 patch-dist.py && cp -f favicon.ico cloud-5/ && ls -ll cloud-5
